sentences.en: Annotations can be added to any widget to clarify functionality.
sentences.cn: 为阐明功能可以在任何部件上增加标注.

sentences.en: Annotations Pane: Add and customize annotations specifying widget functionality.
sentences.cn: 附注面板: 用于增加和自定义对部件功能的详细说明.

sentences.en: At the same time, Baidu recently partnered with Nokia to provide widget on Nokia's Widsets platform.
sentences.cn: 与此同时, 百度最近与诺基亚结成合作关系,为诺基亚的维信平台提供微件.

sentences.en: Company A produces 6,000 widgets a month at a unit price of $0.33.
sentences.cn: A公司每月生产6,000件产品，每件单价0.33美元。

sentences.en: Display Space is the area requested by a widget for the purposes of painting itself.
sentences.cn: 填充区域是填充器允许放置部件的区域.

sentences.en: Double - click ( or begin typing ) on the Text Panel widget to edit the text.
sentences.cn: 每个组件都有在设计中可被编辑的属性.

sentences.en: Enable Widget: Enable form widgets like a drop list or text field.
sentences.cn: 使部件有效: 使窗体部件有效,例如下拉列表框或文本框.

sentences.en: FUEL - UP ! is the best widget for those who drive.
sentences.cn: 这个插件是驾驶者最好的帮手!

sentences.en: Now select a size for your brand new widget!
sentences.cn: 现在请为这个新聊窗设定尺寸!

sentences.en: Ook voegt HTC eigen gratis widgets aan de Android Market coals Parkingtimer, Translator en een ringtone - widget.
sentences.cn: 它还增加了宏达自己的,自由的部件,如机器人市场停车计时器, 翻译部件和铃声.

sentences.en: Scalable businesses are those that can produce the next widget at a fraction of the cost.
sentences.cn: 升级的公司就是那些可以用很小的成本就生产出新产品的公司.

sentences.en: The Widget is optimized for the 5800 Display - Size.
sentences.cn: 窗口小部件是5800优化的显示尺寸.

sentences.en: Then we utilize Toolbar widget and imagelist widget to achieve the design of the main interface.
sentences.cn: 利用Toolbar控件与imagelist控件来实现主界面的设计.

sentences.en: This will also avoid that the widget converter and field validator get out of sync.
sentences.cn: 这也将会避免部件转换器和域校验器不同步.

sentences.en: Widget Title Free Screen Sharing for Everyone!

words.tran_cn: 装饰物；小机械；未定名的主要新产品

trans.tran_cn: 小器具，装饰品，窗口小部件
trans.tran_en: a small piece of equipment that you do not know the name for
